about_the_game:
Welcome to "Juicy Cream Pie," a 3D visual novel where helping a girl dig up dirt online turns into a wild ride.

Navigate through mature moments, unravel a mystery, and choose to stay human or unleash your beast, affecting how you and the girls around you interact in intimate moments.

And yes, this is an 18+ game (in human years).

Key Features:

  • Animated NSFW Scenes: Dive into fully animated NSFW scenes where humans connect with humans, or humans explore their wilder sides in a fresh, juicy 3D twist!

  • Cutting-edge liquid animations, voice-acted scenes, and your choices lead to multiple endings—stay human or unleash your inner beast!

Wishlist Now! By smacking that WISHLIST button, you're casting a mega-mojo spell on our dev team, boosting their motivation by +1000 to whip up more juicy scenes and fluffy adventures just for you!

Follow us on Twitter (yeah, Twitter, we just need to be sure you're old enough to understand where to go) for all the juicy updates and behind-the-scenes goodies. Your feedback there helps us shape the story into something even more wild and wonderful!

Our demo hits NextFest, and early access kicks off in March. As a tiny studio, we’re pouring our hearts into adding more furries, twists, and juicy surprises, all shaped by your feedback.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features mature scenes that are an essential part of the story, showing life as it is—raw, real, and uncensored. All characters are adults, and every act depicted is based on full, mutual consent. Our advanced liquid animations add a touch of realism, while the tale remains entirely fictional.
